content:
Hi, I am running following command (https://github.com/dwrensha/animate-lean-proofs/tree/main)
lake exe Animate Input/NNG.lean NNG.mul_pow > c:\temp\mul_pow.json
Γ£û [4365/4365] Building Animate

error: failed to execute 'c:\Users\zifen\.elan\toolchains\leanprover--lean4---v4.9.0\bin\leanc.exe': unspecified system_category error (error code: 206)
Some builds logged failures:

  • Animate
    error: build failed

I don't know how to proceed from here. Thanks

did you run lake exe cache get first?
also is lean4.9.0 working on your computer? try elan toolchain list to see if lean4.9.0 is installed.
Note: I used this repo before but with lean 4.8.0
Presumably error code 206 is "The filename or extension is too long." but that path doesn't look that long to me...
